definitions.definition: Imparting or improving beauty , particularly the beauty of the complexion .
External or superficial ; pertaining only to the surface or appearance of something.
examples: Fortunately, the damage to the house was mostly cosmetic and a bit of paint covered it nicely.

main_definition: Imparting or improving beauty , particularly the beauty of the complexion .
secondary_definitions: External or superficial ; pertaining only to the surface or appearance of something.
